meanings.sent1: I decided to forgo dessert to save money.
meanings.sent2: She had to forgo her dream vacation due to unexpected expenses.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel had to forgo its acorn snack when a mischievous bird stole it.
meanings.sent4: In order to reach his goal, he had to forgo distractions like social media.
meanings.sent5: The knight had to forgo his sword to prove his bravery in the challenge.

meanings.sent1: He chose to forgo sugary drinks for a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent2: The monks forgo worldly possessions in their pursuit of spiritual enlightenment.
meanings.sent3: The cat had to forgo chasing the mouse when it scurried into a tiny hole.
meanings.sent4: She decided to forgo negative thoughts and focus on positivity instead.
meanings.sent5: The athlete had to forgo his favorite food to maintain peak performance during training.
